title: Formula 1 Circuits & Driver Stats Dashboard
description: An interactive Tableau dashboard exploring Formula 1 circuits worldwide and per-track stats (most wins, podiums, fastest laps). Built by cleaning and preparing 1M+ rows of race data in Python and Excel, mapping circuits precisely with custom GeoJSON, and designing an intuitive flow for detailed track viewsâ€”making global racing history more accessible for fans and analysts.

title: Love Island USA Season 7 Visualization
description: An interactive, web-based data visualization project exploring relationship dynamics and contestant timelines from Season 7 of Love Island USA. Built with Next.js, D3.js, and TypeScript, the site visualizes contestant entries and couple formations over time using a force-directed graph.

title: Movie Recommendation System
description: Interactive movie recommendation app (Streamlit) using content-based filtering with cosine similarity over movie metadata. Fast, intuitive, and shows poster previews.

title: Metabolic Mystery: Interactive Exploration
description: Storytelling site visualizing macronutrients' effect on insulin response. D3-powered inputs predict metabolic health categories; animated clusters explain the relationships.

title: Comparative CNN Architectures
description: AlexNet vs. GoogLeNet on CIFAR-10 with Optuna sweeps; analyses of activations, dropout, pooling, and learning rates for multi-class image classification.

title: PCA Spotify Music Recommendation
description: Music recommendations from PCA embeddings with tunable preferences like danceability, loudness, and instrumentalness.

title: Classifier Evaluations
description: Random Forest, Decision Tree, KNN, Naive Bayes, SVM, and Logistic Regression across multiple UCI datasets—clean comparison and write-up.

title: Power Outages
description: Data storytelling site on U.S. power outages (2000–2006) with ML for duration predictions. Narrative + interactive visuals.

title: Ship Survival: Titanic, Lusitania, and Estonia
description: Demographic differences among survivors in three maritime disasters—tidy data, exploration, and results.

title: KNN Classifier
description: Binary classifier detecting Day vs Night images using KNN and hand-crafted features.

title: British Bakeoff Analysis
description: Hypothesis testing, regression, bootstrapping, and visualization on Great British Bake Off datasets.

title: Dicegame
description: A playful probability game with a simple UI hosted on GitHub Pages.

title: Wedding Planner
description: Evenly distributes guests across tables based on user inputs—small but handy.
